name: web_search_brave
description: Search the web using Brave Search for real-time information including general queries, news, events, and location-based searches. Automatically extracts location from natural language queries like 'near me', 'in Chicago', etc. Returns TTS-optimized responses perfect for voice synthesis.

query.description: The search query from the user. Can include natural language location references like 'pizza near me' or 'hotels in San Francisco'

type.description: Type of search: 'web' for general searches, 'news' for recent news and events

location.description: Optional explicit location. If not provided, the system will try to extract location from the query
